description: Mercury’s surface reveals it has been shrinking for billions of years due to cooling and faulting. A new study estimates the planet’s radius has contracted by 2.7–5.6 kilometers, offering the most precise figures yet. The findings sharpen understanding of Mercury’s thermal evolution and could help scientists apply the same techniques to tectonic studies on Mars and other rocky planets.
title: Mercury Has Shrunk by Several Kilometers Over Billions of Years, Scientists Report

description: NASA and ISRO’s joint NISAR mission has successfully deployed its 12-meter radar reflector in orbit. This unique satellite, carrying dual L-band and S-band radars, will monitor Earth’s glaciers, volcanoes, earthquakes, and ecosystems with unmatched accuracy. The milestone reflects decades of research and showcases the strength of U.S.-India space collaboration, aiming to revolutionize Earth observation for science, policy, and sustainable development.
title: NASA-ISRO Earth Observation Satellite Unfolds Giant Radar Antenna in Space

description: Scientists have recreated helium hydride ions, the universe’s first molecules, under lab conditions. The study reveals these ions were far more effective in driving early star formation than older theories suggested. Published in Astronomy and Astrophysics, the research reshapes understanding of early cosmic chemistry and challenges assumptions about how quickly the first stars emerged.
title: Scientists Recreate Universe’s First Molecules, Challenging Early Star Formation Theories

description: Itti Si Khushi is a new family drama released on Sony SAB TV, Sony LIV and OTTplay. The show features Sumbul Touqueer Khan as the lead, taking care of her four siblings, as they are usually laughed at despite having a father. Still, he is an alcoholic, and in the first trailer, the father has sold their house. Watch Anvita tackle this while taking care of her siblings.
title: A Itti Si Khushi Now Streaming on SonyLIV: What You Need to Know About This Grit-Packed Family Drama

description: Kapata Nataka Sutradhari is a Kannada-language drama film that stars Dhiraj MV in the lead role. The film follows a Muslim man who gets stuck under an elephant in a Hindu temple during a ritual to fulfil his wish. The movie explores themes of social issues and inequalities with humor. Streaming soon.
title: Kapata Nataka Sutradhari OTT Release Dater: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Only Murders in the Building returns with season 5 as the trio - Charles, Oliver, and Mabel - are set to investigate a murder that the police have declared an accident. The trio will dig deeper and uncover some shocking connections and secrets surfacing the murder. Watch from Sept. 9th, only on JioHotstar.
title: Only Murders in the Building Season 5 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: SpaceX’s upcoming 10th Starship test flight, scheduled for Aug. 24 from Starbase, Texas, is a milestone for the company’s ambitious rocket program. The launch will validate deployment systems, engine restart capability, and controlled reentry maneuvers, all vital for future crewed missions to the moon and Mars.
title: SpaceX Schedules 10th Starship Test Flight for August 24 Amid Recent Setbacks

description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra may feature Flex Magic Pixel technology, which narrows the screen’s viewing angle to enhance privacy, especially when combined with AI. Unlike traditional privacy films, it is said to preserve brightness and image quality. The technology will enter mass production for the first time for the Galaxy S26 Ultra and may also be used in the Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Z Flip 8.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra May Feature Flex Magic Pixel Technology for Display Privacy

description: HMD Vibe 2 could launch soon as a successor to last year's HMD Vibe. Ahead of the official announcement, it was spotted on an e-commerce website. It is listed with a Unisoc T606 chipset and a 5,000mAh battery. It is likely to have a 6.75-inch display and a 50-megapixel rear camera unit.
title: HMD Vibe 2 Design, Specifications Listed on Retailer's Website; HMD Fuse Spotted in EPREL Database

description: India’s PC market growth has relatively slowed down in the second quarter of 2025 (Q2 2025), according to the market research firm IDC. After seeing a year-on-year (YoY) growth of 8.1 percent in the first quarter of the year, India’s PC market grew at 3 percent in the second quarter. However, HP and Lenovo retained the top spot, commanding 30.8 percent and 20.3 percent market share in the quarter, respectively.
title: HP Retained Top Spot as India's PC Market Grew 3 Percent YoY in Q2 2025: IDC

description: US Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said on Monday that British authorities had rescinded an order asking the company to circumvent encryption to help them pursue certain national security and criminal investigations.
title: UK Scraps Demand for Apple ‘Backdoor’ After Pressure From US

description: Adobe Acrobat Studio was introduced on Tuesday as a new platform for PDF tools and artificial intelligence (AI) features for content creation. The San Jose, California-based software giant stated that it is an upgraded platform aimed at offering the trifecta of AI-powered PDF tools, content creation features, and AI assistants that can analyse, summarise, and answer queries about files.
title: Adobe Acrobat Studio Launched With PDF Spaces and Access to Adobe Express Features

description: Asus JoGeek sub-brand in India was expanded on Tuesday with new DDR4 8GB and DDR5 16GB RAM models. The company also launched new PCIe Gen4 SSDs in 512GB and 1TB variants offering up to 7,000 MB/s read speeds. The lineup also includes the DC110 4-in-1 and DC210 8-in-1 USB-C docks, ROG 240W and 100W USB Type-C cables, and a 100W 3-Port GaN Charger supporting multiple fast-charging standards.
title: Asus Launches JoGeek RAM, SSDs Launched in India Alongside New USB Type-C Docks

description: Gamescom Opening Night Live will take place later today at 11.30pm IST. The in-person event will be livestreamed across YouTube and Twitch. Here's how to watch the show digitally.
title: Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025: Broadcast Time and How to Watch

description: Google Pixel 10 series is expected to launch at the Made By Google event on August 20. The lineup may feature the Pixel 10, 10 Pro, 10 Pro XL, and 10 Pro Fold. Ahead of the anticipated debut, benchmark scores for the Pixel 10 Pro XL have surfaced online. The scores reportedly show a significant CPU improvement.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL Benchmark Scores Hint at Higher CPU and Lower GPU Performance

description: Grammarly, on Monday, announced a range of new artificial intelligence (AI) agents. These AI agents are aimed at solving specific writing-related challenges and can help users improve their writing, as well as offer tools to better check the content for plagiarism and AI-generated text. These agents are being integrated into the company’s new platform, dubbed Docs, which is an AI-native writing surface.
title: Grammarly Will Now Use AI Agents to Review, Check Plagiarism and Detect AI-Generated Content

description: Realme 15T has been spotted on benchmarking website Geekbench with the model number RMX5111, and the performance benchmarks for the handset indicate that it may run on Android 15. It was spotted with the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Max chipset and it could be equipped with at least 8GB of RAM.
title: Realme 15T Arrives on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Max SoC, 8GB of RAM

description: Samsung  Galaxy Tab S10 Lite could go official soon. Ahead of the formal reveal, new images showing the complete design, colour options, and RAM and storage configurations of the  Galaxy Tab S10 Lite have leaked online.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Price, Design Renders Surface Online; Tipped to Debut With 8,000mAh Battery

description: Anthropic is rolling out the ability to end conversations in some of its artificial intelligence (AI) models. Announced last week, the new feature is designed as a protective measure for not the end user, but for the AI model itself. The San Francisco-based AI firm said the new capability was developed as part of its work on “potential AI welfare,” as conversations on certain topics can distress the Claude models.
title: Anthropic Will Now Let Claude End Conversations if the Topic Is Harmful or Abusive

description: Apple is reportedly expanding the production of its smartphones in India, which will be exported to the US. The Cupertino tech giant could be trying to avoid the recently announced reciprocal tariffs against China that are yet to come into effect. The tech giant has been trying to shift its production base from China to India as trade uncertainties rise between China and the US.
title: iPhone 17 Series Production Said to Be Expanded in India as Apple Assembles More Models Locally

description: The Google Pixel 10 series is all set to be launched at the Made by Google event tomorrow (August 20). At the launch event, the tech giant will take the wraps off its next-generation flagship smartphones. Based on the previous trends, Google’s upcoming handset lineup is expected to comprise four models — Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Google is reported to also unveil the Pixel Watch 4 and the Pixel Buds A-Series sucessor. Here’s what to expect.
title: Made by Google Event: From Google Pixel 10 Series to Pixel Watch 4, What to Expect

description: Notion Mail, the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered email app, is finally available on iOS. On Monday, the company announced that it was finally rolling out its email app on the App Store, and it is now available for everyone to download. The San Francisco-based workspace application firm first released Notion Mail on Android in April.
title: Notion Mail AI-Powered Email App Is Now Available on iOS, Supports More Than 18 Languages

description: The OnePlus 15 is expected to feature a 1.5K LTPO display with up to 165Hz refresh rate and a new performance system enabling 165fps native gaming, making it the smoothest OnePlus phone yet. It may debut in a new “Moon Rock Black” colourway and come with a refined sandstone-textured protective case. The handset is tipped to come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC, house a 7,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and sport a redesigned square camera module with triple 50-megapixel sensors.
title: OnePlus 15 Display Specifications Leaked; Said to Arrive in New Black Colourway

description: The Redmi 15 5G is yet another premium smartphone from the brand. The handset comes equipped with a large 6.9-inch display that comes with up to 144Hz screen refresh rate. The smartphone is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 processor and packs up to 8GB of RAM. The device also features a massive 7,000mAh silicon-carbon battery, which is a first in this segment. Check out the first impression to know more about the latest smartphone from Redmi.
title: Redmi 15 5G First Impressions

description: EA has rolled out a new update to Battlefield 2042, adding a fan-favourite map, new weapons and vehicles, and Battlefield 6 rewards. The update also adds a free Battlepass, alongside bringing bug fixes and gameplay changes.
title: Battlefield 2042 Gets New Update That Adds Fan-Favourite Map, Weapons and Battlefield 6 Rewards

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ will launch in China soon. Ahead of the formal launch, the company has teased key specifications of the phone. It is teased to feature a 7,000mAh battery with support for 90W wired fast charging and 22.5W wired reverse charging.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ Display, Battery Specifications Confirmed Days Ahead of Launch in China

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) has announced that it is rolling out its 5G services to two new cities. This is part of the telecom service provider’s ongoing effort to expand its 5G coverage in India to 23 cities, including 17 priority circles. As an introductory offer, the company is offering unlimited 5G data to its subscribers with a recharge of Rs. 299.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) 5G Services Rolled Out in Kochi, Thiruvananthapuram With Introductory Offers

description: Vivo V60 has launched in India with a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, a 6,500mAh battery, and Zeiss-backed triple rear cameras featuring a 50-megapixel main and 50-megapixel telephoto sensor. It sports a 1.5K quad-curved AMOLED display with 5,000 nits peak brightness. Prices range from Rs. 36,999 to Rs. 45,999 across four RAM and storage variants. Online buyers get up to 10 percent discounts, no-cost EMI options, and bundle offers with Vivo TWS 3e. Offline deals include EMI, cashback, and exchange benefits as well.
title: Vivo V60 With 50-Megapixel Telephoto Camera, 6.77-inch Display Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: Xiaomi 15T and 15T Pro are expected to launch soon. Expected to succeed the Xiaomi 14T series, the leaks for the lineup have been surfacing online for a while. Now, its price for the European market has been leaked ahead of its supposed launch. The series could feature two smartphones - the standard Xiaomi 15T and the Xiaomi 15T Pro. Additionally, the camera and battery specifications of the phones have also surfaced online.
title: Xiaomi 15T Series Price, Specifications Leak Indicates Launch of Premium Category Phones

description: Apple on Monday released the iOS 26 Beta 7 update for iPhone to developers and beta testers. It arrives exactly a week after the sixth beta update was rolled out. It carries subtle changes compared to previous iOS 26 Beta iterations, but there are no major new features. As per a report, the iOS 26 Beta 7 update brings back blood oxygen monitoring capability to the Apple Watch for users in the US. Other changes include a Drafts option in the Messages app and an Adaptive Power Notifications toggle in battery settings.
title: Apple Rolls Out iOS 26 Beta 7 With Drafts Option in Messages, Blood Oxygen Measurement for Apple Watch in the US

description: Google Docs is getting a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will let viewers of a document listen to the content instead of reading it. First announced at the Google Cloud Next 2025 event earlier this year, the Mountain View-based tech giant has finally started rolling out the audio feature to users on the paid tier of Workspace and Gemini subscribers.
title: Google Docs Is Getting a New Gemini Feature That Lets Users Listen to Documents

description: Microsoft is adding the Copilot function to Excel, introducing a suite of artificial intelligence (AI) features. These features will allow a user to summarise data sets and columns into simpler forms, such as paragraphs and sentences. The tech giant has integrated the AI features into Excel formulas. Users can initiate a query by typing “COPILOT” followed by their query.
title: Microsoft Excel Tests New Copilot Function With Ability to Classify Data, Generate Summaries and More

description: Nintendo has announced a Direct presentation dedicated to upcoming Switch 2 racing title Kirby Air Riders. The livestream will take place on Tuesday, August 19. It will feature an "in-depth" look at the game with director Masahiro Sakurai.
title: Nintendo Announces Direct Presentation With 'In-Depth' Look at Kirby Air Riders

description: Redmi 15 5G has been launched in India with a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC and a 6.9-inch full-HD+ display with a 144Hz refresh rate. It runs HyperOS 2.0 which is based on Android 15 and will get two OS upgrades and four years of security updates. It includes a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, an 8-megapixel selfie shooter, Dolby-certified speakers, and several AI features. The handset packs a 7,000mAh battery with 33W charging, and it has an IP64 rating, a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, and an IR Blaster.
title: Redmi 15 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: TCL 60 Ultra Nxtpaper smartphone is expected to debut soon. TCL is yet to confirm its arrival, but the handset has been listed on an e-commerce website, revealing its design and specifications. It is shown with a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, coupled with 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. It has a triple rear camera unit and a 5,200mAh battery.
title: TCL 60 Ultra Nxtpaper With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC Listed on Retailer Website Ahead of Imminent Launch

description: Google is reportedly testing a new translation tool within Circle to Search. While some Pixel beta users see it as Scroll and Translate, the app code also refers to it as Live Translate, causing branding confusion. The feature is said to translate entire screens but lacks cropping support, has some processing delays, and uses a text-on-text overlay. To access it, users must tap the Translate icon in Circle to Search.
title: Google Tests ‘Scroll and Translate’ Feature for Circle to Search on Pixel Phones: Report

description: Honor has confirmed that the Magic V5 will debut in the UK on August 28, with the launch event set to be held in London. According to teasers shared on Honor’s X handle, the phone will sport a slim 8.8mm profile and support the Magic Pen stylus. Globally, it is teased to be offered in Black, Dawn Gold, and Ivory White shades.
title: Honor Magic V5 Global Launch Date Announced; Colour Options Revealed

description: OpenAI on Tuesday announced a new subscription plan called ChatGPT Go as a low-cost alternative to the existing ChatGPT Plus subscription. Initially introduced in India, it will also be expanded to other markets soon. As per the company, ChatGPT Go grants users access to higher message limits, larger file uploads, and expanded image generation. Further, they can enjoy advanced data analytics and longer memory for more personalised responses when conversing with the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot.
title: OpenAI Launches ChatGPT Go in India as a Low-Cost Subscription Plan With Higher Limits, Longer Memory

description: Bharti Airtel is offering a free subscription to Apple Music to prepaid users in India. In February, the telecom operator announced a strategic partnership with Apple, which saw the rollout of complimentary access to Apple TV+ and the company’s music streaming service for Airtel’s Wi-Fi and postpaid user base. With the latest move, it has been extended to Airtel’s prepaid plans as well, with the availability of the offer via the Airtel Thanks app.
title: Airtel Rolls Out Free Apple Music Subscription for Prepaid Users in India for Six Months

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE was launched in select global markets on Monday. The latest affordable true wireless stereo (TWS) earphones from the South Korean tech conglomerate arrive as the successor to the Galaxy Buds FE, which debuted in October 2023. At its core, the Galaxy Buds 3 FE comes with active noise cancellation (ANC) and Galaxy AI features. The TWS earbuds support pinch and swipe gestures.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE Launched With ANC, Hands-Free Gemini Support: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi 15 5G is all set to be launched in India today (August 19). It will arrive as a 5G-ready version of the Redmi 15 4G, which was introduced in select markets earlier this month. As part of the build-up to the handset’s launch, the Xiaomi subsidiary has been teasing several details. It is confirmed to pack a 7,000mAh battery with 18W reverse wireless charging. The Redmi 15 5G will sport a 144Hz display and an AI-backed 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Redmi 15 5G Launching Today: Know Price, Features, Specifications and More
